revised_title: PVT Properties of Water: Liquid Water in the Temperature Range to and at Pressures up to 1 kb
tldr: The authors describe an apparatus for measuring the properties of water with high accuracy up to 1 kb over a wide temperature range. They provide specific volumes, densities, and thermal expansivities in tabular form and discuss the thermal expansion of water relative to mercury. The study aims to improve the accuracy of pressure measurements and address the limitations of previous methods.
